nodes.text: Sometime after 200,000 BBY, two cults—the female Taung sisterhood known as the Warriors of Shadow and the death cult Knell of Muspilli—battled each other in a terrible naval battle above a unnamed moon in the Unknown Regions. The battle site was discovered tens of thousands of years later, during the Cold War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic; many of the cults' derelict starships remained at the site.
The battle between the two cults was first mentioned in the Archaeology crewskill "Battle of Terror" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
